definitions.text: a beverage made by steeping tea leaves in water
examples: iced tea is a cooling drink

definitions.text: a light midafternoon meal of tea and sandwiches or cakes
examples: an Englishman would interrupt a war to have his afternoon tea

definitions.text: a tropical evergreen shrub or small tree extensively cultivated in e.g. China and Japan and India; source of tea leaves
a reception or party at which tea is served
examples: we met at the Dean's tea for newcomers

definitions.text: dried leaves of the tea shrub; used to make tea
examples: the store shelves held many different kinds of tea
they threw the tea into Boston harbor
